name: Ronith_Blario
content:
Ronith Blario was a human male who was a pilot for the Resistance fleet during their war against the First Order. He was a reckless rookie who flew an RZ-2 A-wing interceptor. He shared the last name with another Resistance pilot named Ataphen Blario.
Ronith Blario wore a green flight suit with a white vest, a FreiTek life support unit, a gray Guidenhauser flight harness, and gray gloves. He wore a red flight helmet, with a black and yellow checkered pattern on top.
Ronith Blario first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which was released on December 15, 2017. The character was not named in the film, but received identification in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with the film.
